languages.text: {n}Каким-то чудом сержант Вигастис все еще жив. Его бока и предплечья пронзают кривые шипы, щедро усеивающие борт судна, но жизненно важные органы целы — друкари знают как растягивать страдания жертв. Остальным страдальцам повезло меньше — кто-то уже практически истек кровью, кто-то не пережил резкого столкновения с землей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Каким-то чудом сержант Вигастис все еще жив. Его бока и предплечья пронзают кривые шипы, щедро усеивающие борт судна, но жизненно важные органы целы — друкари знают как растягивать страдания жертв. Остальным страдальцам повезло меньше — кто-то уже практически истек кровью, кто-то не пережил резкого столкновения с землей.{/n}

languages.text: {n}By some miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is still alive. His sides and forearms are impaled on the crooked spikes that cover the side of the craft but his vital organs are intact: the Drukhari know how to prolong their victims' suffering. The rest of these people are not as fortunate. Some have nearly bled out, while others succumbed to the rough impact.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каким-то чудом сержант Вигастис все еще жив. Его бока и предплечья пронзают кривые шипы, щедро усеивающие борт судна, но жизненно важные органы целы — друкари знают как растягивать страдания жертв. Остальным страдальцам повезло меньше — кто-то уже практически истек кровью, кто-то не пережил резкого столкновения с землей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}By some miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is still alive. His sides and forearms are impaled on the crooked spikes that cover the side of the craft, but his vital organs are intact — the Drukhari know how to prolong their victims' suffering. The rest of these people were not as fortunate — some have nearly bled out, others did not survive the rough impact.{/n}

The rest of these people were not as fortunate — some have nearly bled out, others did not survive the rough impact.{/n}

{n}By some miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is still alive. His sides and forearms are impaled on the crooked spikes that cover the side of the craft but his vital organs are intact: the Drukhari know how to prolong their victims' suffering. The rest of these people are not as fortunate. Some have nearly bled out, while others succumbed to the rough impact.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Par miracle, le sergent Vigastes est encore en vie. Ses côtes et avant-bras ont été empalés sur les pics qui recouvrent le vaisseau, mais ses organes vitaux sont intacts. Les Drukharis savent parfaitement comment prolonger l'agonie de leurs victimes. Les autres prisonniers n'ont pas eu autant de chance. Certains ont succombé à leur hémorragie, d'autres sont morts à l'impact.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By some miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is still alive. His sides and forearms are impaled on the crooked spikes that cover the side of the craft but his vital organs are intact: the Drukhari know how to prolong their victims' suffering. The rest of these people are not as fortunate. Some have nearly bled out, while others succumbed to the rough impact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Par miracle, le sergent Vigastes est encore en vie. Ses côtes et avant-bras ont été empalés sur les pics qui recouvrent le vaisseau, mais ses organes vitaux sont intacts. Les Drukharis savent parfaitement comment prolonger l'agonie de leurs victimes. Les autres prisonniers n'ont pas eu autant de chance. Certains ont succombé à leur hémorragie, d'autres sont morts à l'impact.{/n}

languages.text: {n}或许出于某种奇迹，维加斯特军士还活着。他的身体两侧和与前臂都被飞船侧面弯曲的尖刺刺穿，但其他重要器官完好无损——黑暗灵族很了解该如何延长猎物的痛苦。至于剩下的人，就没有那么幸运了。一部分人失血过多而死，而另一部分则死于猛烈的撞击。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By some miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is still alive. His sides and forearms are impaled on the crooked spikes that cover the side of the craft but his vital organs are intact: the Drukhari know how to prolong their victims' suffering. The rest of these people are not as fortunate. Some have nearly bled out, while others succumbed to the rough impact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}或许出于某种奇迹，维加斯特军士还活着。他的身体两侧和与前臂都被飞船侧面弯曲的尖刺刺穿，但其他重要器官完好无损——黑暗灵族很了解该如何延长猎物的痛苦。至于剩下的人，就没有那么幸运了。一部分人失血过多而死，而另一部分则死于猛烈的撞击。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴィガステス軍曹は奇跡的にも、まだ生きていた。彼の脇腹と前腕は、船の側面を覆う湾曲したトゲに突き刺さっているが、内臓は無事のようだ。デュカーリは犠牲者を長く苦しめる方法を知っている。他の人々の状態はひどいものだった。失血死寸前の者もいれば、激しい衝撃でボロボロになった者もいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By some miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is still alive. His sides and forearms are impaled on the crooked spikes that cover the side of the craft but his vital organs are intact: the Drukhari know how to prolong their victims' suffering. The rest of these people are not as fortunate. Some have nearly bled out, while others succumbed to the rough impact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィガステス軍曹は奇跡的にも、まだ生きていた。彼の脇腹と前腕は、船の側面を覆う湾曲したトゲに突き刺さっているが、内臓は無事のようだ。デュカーリは犠牲者を長く苦しめる方法を知っている。他の人々の状態はひどいものだった。失血死寸前の者もいれば、激しい衝撃でボロボロになった者もいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wie durch ein Wunder ist Unteroffizier Vigastes noch am Leben. Seine Seiten und Unterarme sind auf den schiefen Stacheln an der Seite des Raumschiffs aufgespießt, aber seine lebenswichtigen Organe sind noch intakt: Die Drukhari wissen genau, wie sie das Leiden ihrer Opfer verlängern. Der Rest dieser Leute hatte weniger Glück. Manche sind kurz vor dem Verbluten, andere wiederum kamen durch den harten Aufprall um.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By some miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is still alive. His sides and forearms are impaled on the crooked spikes that cover the side of the craft but his vital organs are intact: the Drukhari know how to prolong their victims' suffering. The rest of these people are not as fortunate. Some have nearly bled out, while others succumbed to the rough impact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie durch ein Wunder ist Unteroffizier Vigastes noch am Leben. Seine Seiten und Unterarme sind auf den schiefen Stacheln an der Seite des Raumschiffs aufgespießt, aber seine lebenswichtigen Organe sind noch intakt: Die Drukhari wissen genau, wie sie das Leiden ihrer Opfer verlängern. Der Rest der Aufgespießten hatte nicht so viel Glück. Manche sind kurz vorm Verbluten, andere wiederum kamen durch den harten Aufprall um.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Milagrosamente, el sargento Vigastes aún vive. Tiene los antebrazos y ambos costados empalados en los afilados pinchos que cubren el flanco de la aeronave, pero sus órganos vitales están intactos: los Drukhari saben cómo prolongar el sufrimiento de sus víctimas. Los demás no han tenido tanta suerte. Algunos se han desangrado, y otros han sucumbido debido al fuerte impacto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By some miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is still alive. His sides and forearms are impaled on the crooked spikes that cover the side of the craft but his vital organs are intact: the Drukhari know how to prolong their victims' suffering. The rest of these people are not as fortunate. Some have nearly bled out, while others succumbed to the rough impact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Milagrosamente, el sargento Vigastes aún vive. Tiene los antebrazos y ambos costados empalados en los afilados pinchos que cubren el flanco de la aeronave, pero sus órganos vitales están intactos: los Drukhari saben cómo prolongar el sufrimiento de sus víctimas. Los demás no han tenido tanta suerte. Algunos se han desangrado, y otros han sucumbido debido al fuerte impacto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir mucizeye tanık oluyorsun: Çavuş Vigastes hâlâ hayatta. Vücudunun yanı ve kolları, geminin yanlarını kaplayan çarpık dikenlere saplanmış. Hayati organları ise sağlam durumda. Drukhariler, kurbanlarının azabını uzatma konusunda oldukça acımasız. Kalan kurbanların çok daha şanssız. Bir kısmı kan kaybından ölmek üzere, kalanlarıysa sert düşüşün kurbanı olmuş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By some miracle, Sergeant Vigastes is still alive. His sides and forearms are impaled on the crooked spikes that cover the side of the craft but his vital organs are intact: the Drukhari know how to prolong their victims' suffering. The rest of these people are not as fortunate. Some have nearly bled out, while others succumbed to the rough impact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir mucizeye tanık oluyorsun: Çavuş Vigastes hâlâ hayatta. Vücudunun yanı ve kolları, geminin yanlarını kaplayan çarpık dikenlere saplanmış ancak hayati organları sağlam durumda. Drukhari, kurbanlarının azabını uzatma konusunda oldukça acımasız. Ancak kalan kurbanlar o kadar şanslı değil. Bir kısmı kan kaybından ölmek üzere, kalanlarıysa sert darbenin kurbanı olmuş.{/n}
